text: "Party to End All Parties" is a 1977 song by Australia glam rock band Skyhooks. It was the only single from their greatest hits album The Skyhooks Tapes. It went to number 24 in Australia. ==Track listing== 7" single (K-6761) * Side A "Party to End All Parties" - 2:30 * Side B "Hot Rod James" - 4:44 == References == Category:1977 songs Category:Skyhooks (band) songs
title: Party to End All Parties
